title: Poker Knowledge Base Enhancement
objective: Create a downloadable ZIP archive containing high-quality, publicly available PDFs and documents on advanced poker topics to enrich a knowledge base for an AI coaching agent.

topics: Poker theory and strategy (GTO, exploitative, pre-flop/post-flop)
Poker mathematics and probability (hand odds, pot odds, equity)
Psychology of poker (tilt, mental game, opponent profiling)
Game theory in poker (CFR, bluffing, equilibrium play)
Reinforcement learning in poker (DeepStack, Libratus, AlphaPoker)
Texas Hold'em rules and formats (cash games, tournaments)
Differences between heads-up and full-ring play
MIT OpenCourseWare or research content on poker or decision-making

output.contents: all discovered documents, categorized by topic, with filenames cleaned and duplicates removed
